name: Catch The Kids: Priest Simulator Game
name_original: Catch The Kids: Priest Simulator Game
description:
A lot of people like kids. But who like them mostly? Of course priests! And our main hero, Father Nick, is not an exception!
Your main task is easy: catch as many kids as possible. Moreover, there are more dangerous and exciting quests, like challenging with your opponents, killing enemies and defeating bosses!
So, what are you waiting for? Show that YOU are the true catcher!
//
If the game is welcomed by users, more additional and FREE content will be added!
